scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && mkdir dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress && cross-env NODE_ENV=prod ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --config webpack.config.js --progress --bail
scripts.build:dev: rimraf output && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev ./node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server --hot --config webpack.config.js --progress && cross-env NODE_ENV=dev ./node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server --hot --config webpack.config.js --progress --bail
scripts.test: npm run build:prod && npm run test:mocha
